verses.verse: וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei Now the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל׀ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְֽמִסְפָּרָ֡ם <WH4557> le-mis-pa-Ram after their number רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> ra-Shei [to wit] the chief הָאָב֣וֹת <WH1> ha-'a-Vot fathers וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> ve-sa-Rei and captains הָֽאֲלָפִ֣ים׀ <WH505> ha-'a-la-Fim of thousands וְהַמֵּא֡וֹת <WH3967> ve-ham-me-'ot and hundreds וְשֹׁטְרֵיהֶם֩ <WH7860> ve-sho-te-rei-Hem and their officers הַמְשָׁרְתִ֨ים <WH8334> ham-sha-re-Tim that served אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech the king לְכֹ֣ל׀ <WH3605> le-Chol any דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> de-Var in any matter הַֽמַּחְלְק֗וֹת <WH4256> ham-mach-le-Kot, of the courses הַבָּאָ֤ה <WH935> hab-ba-'Ah which came in וְהַיֹּצֵאת֙ <WH3318> ve-hai-yo-tzeT and went out חֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> Cho-desh month בְּחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> be-Cho-desh, by month לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> le-Chol all חָדְשֵׁ֣י <WH2320> cha-de-Shei throughout all the months הַשָּׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> hash-sha-Nah; of the year הַֽמַּחֲלֹ֙קֶת֙ <WH4256> ham-ma-cha-Lo-ket course הָֽאַחַ֔ת <WH259> ha-'a-Chat, of every עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

עַ֞ל <WH5921> 'al and הַמַּחֲלֹ֤קֶת <WH4256> ham-ma-cha-Lo-ket course הָרִֽאשׁוֹנָה֙ <WH7223> ha-ri-sho-Nah Over the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> ha-ri-Shon, for the first יָֽשָׁבְעָ֖ם <WH3434> ya-sha-ve-'Am [was] Jashobeam בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son זַבְדִּיאֵ֑ל <WH2068> zav-di-'El; of Zabdiel וְעַל֙ <WH5921> ve-'Al and in מַֽחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. thousand

מִן־ <WH4480> min- at בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- Of the children פֶ֗רֶץ <WH6557> Fe-retz, of Perez הָרֹ֛אשׁ <WH7218> ha-Rosh [was] the chief לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol of all שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> sa-Rei of all the captains הַצְּבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> hatz-tze-va-'ot of the host לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הָרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <WH7223> ha-ri-Shon. for the first

וְעַ֞ל <WH5921> ve-'Al and over מַחֲלֹ֣קֶת׀ <WH4256> ma-cha-Lo-ket And over the course הַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> ha-Cho-desh month הַשֵּׁנִ֗י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni, of the second דּוֹדַ֤י <WH1737> do-Dai [was] Dodai הָאֲחוֹחִי֙ <WH266> ha-'a-cho-Chi an Ahohite וּמַ֣חֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> u-Ma-cha-luk-To, and of his course וּמִקְל֖וֹת <WH4732> u-mik-Lot [was] Mikloth הַנָּגִ֑יד <WH5057> han-na-Gid; also the ruler וְעַל֙ <WH5921> ve-'Al in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> ma-cha-luk-To, in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim likewise [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> sar captain הַצָּבָ֤א <WH6635> hatz-tza-Va of the host הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi The third לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi, for the third בְּנָיָ֧הוּ <WH1141> be-na-Ya-hu [was] Benaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son יְהוֹיָדָ֛ע <WH3077> ye-ho-ya-Da' of Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen priest רֹ֑אשׁ <WH7218> Rosh; a chief וְעַל֙ <WH5921> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. thousand

ה֧וּא <WH1931> hu This בְנָיָ֛הוּ <WH1141> ve-na-Ya-hu This [is that] Benaiah גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> gib-Bor [who was] mighty הַשְּׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <WH7970> hash-she-lo-Shim [among] the thirty וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- charge הַשְּׁלֹשִׁ֑ים <WH7970> hash-she-lo-Shim; and above the thirty וּמַ֣חֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> u-Ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עַמִּיזָבָ֖ד <WH5990> 'am-mi-za-Vad [was] Ammizabad בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> be-No. his son ס sa-Mek

הָֽרְבִיעִ֞י <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'I The fourth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הָרְבִיעִ֗י <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'I, [captain] for the fourth עֲשָׂה־ 'a-sah- אֵל֙ <WH6214> 'el [was] Asahel אֲחִ֣י <WH251> 'a-Chi the brother יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> yo-'Av, of Joab וּזְבַדְיָ֥ה <WH2069> u-ze-vad-Yah and Zebadiah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> ve-No his son אַחֲרָ֑יו <WH310> 'a-cha-Rav; after וְעַל֙ <WH5921> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> ma-cha-luk-To, him and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

הַחַמִישִׁי֙ <WH2549> ha-cha-mi-Shi The fifth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הַחֲמִישִׁ֔י <WH2549> ha-cha-mi-Shi, for the fifth הַשַּׂ֖ר <WH8269> has-Sar captain שַׁמְה֣וּת <WH8049> sham-Hut [was] Shamhuth הַיִּזְרָ֑ח <WH3155> hai-yiz-Rach; the Izrahite וְעַל֙ <WH5921> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

הַשִּׁשִּׁי֙ <WH8345> hash-shish-Shi The sixth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <WH8345> hash-shish-Shi, [captain] for the sixth עִירָ֥א <WH5896> 'i-Ra [was] Ira בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son עִקֵּ֖שׁ <WH6142> 'ik-Kesh of Ikkesh הַתְּקוֹעִ֑י <WH8621> hat-te-ko-'I; the Tekoite וְעַל֙ <WH5921> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

הַשְּׁבִיעִי֙ <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I The seventh לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I, [captain] for the seventh חֶ֥לֶץ <WH2503> Che-letz [was] Helez הַפְּלוֹנִ֖י <WH6397> hap-pe-lo-Ni the Pelonite מִן־ <WH4480> min- at בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim; of Ephraim וְעַל֙ <WH5921> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

הַשְּׁמִינִי֙ <WH8066> hash-she-mi-Ni The eighth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁמִינִ֔י <WH8066> hash-she-mi-Ni, [captain] for the eighth סִבְּכַ֥י <WH5444> sib-be-Chai [was] Sibbecai הַחֻשָׁתִ֖י <WH2843> ha-chu-sha-Ti the Hushathite לַזַּרְחִ֑י <WH2227> laz-zar-Chi; of the Zarhites וְעַל֙ <WH5921> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

הַתְּשִׁיעִי֙ <WH8671> hat-te-shi-'I The ninth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הַתְּשִׁיעִ֔י <WH8671> hat-te-shi-'I, [captain] for the ninth אֲבִיעֶ֥זֶר <WH44> 'a-vi-'E-zer [was] Abiezer הָעַנְּתֹתִ֖י <WH6069> ha-'an-ne-to-Ti the Anetothite; לַבֶּנְיְמִינִי lab-ben-ye-mi-ni כלַבֵּ֣ן lab-Ben ק; יְמִינִ֑י <WH1145> ye-mi-Ni; Benjamite קוְעַל֙ <WH5921> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

הָעֲשִׂירִי֙ <WH6224> ha-'a-si-Ri The tenth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הָעֲשִׂירִ֔י <WH6224> ha-'a-si-Ri, [captain] for the tenth מַהְרַ֥י <WH4121> mah-Rai [was] Maharai הַנְּטֽוֹפָתִ֖י <WH5200> han-ne-to-fa-Ti the Netophathite לַזַּרְחִ֑י <WH2227> laz-zar-Chi; of the Zarhites וְעַל֙ <WH5921> ve-'Al and in מַֽחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

עַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <WH6249> 'ash-tei- eleven עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten לְעַשְׁתֵּ֣י־ <WH6249> le-'ash-Tei- eleven עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten הַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> ha-Cho-desh, month בְּנָיָ֥ה <WH1141> be-na-Yah [was] Benaiah הַפִּרְעָתוֹנִ֖י <WH6553> hap-pir-'a-to-Ni the Pirathonite מִן־ <WH4480> min- at בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim; of Ephraim וְעַל֙ <WH5921> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

הַשְּׁנֵ֤ים <WH8147> hash-she-Neim both עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten לִשְׁנֵ֣ים <WH8147> lish-Neim both עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten הַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> ha-Cho-desh, month חֶלְדַּ֥י <WH2469> chel-Dai [was] Heldai הַנְּטוֹפָתִ֖י <WH5200> han-ne-to-fa-Ti the Netophathite לְעָתְנִיאֵ֑ל <WH6274> le-'a-te-ni-'El; of Othniel וְעַל֙ <WH5921> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. thousand פ Peh

וְעַל֙ <WH5921> ve-'Al charge שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> shiv-Tei Furthermore over the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לָרֽאוּבֵנִ֣י <WH7206> lo-r-'u-ve-Ni of the Reubenites נָגִ֔יד <WH5057> na-Gid, the ruler אֱלִיעֶ֖זֶר <WH461> 'e-li-'E-zer [was] Eliezer בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son זִכְרִ֑י <WH2147> zich-Ri; of Zichri ס sa-Mek לַשִּׁ֨מְעוֹנִ֔י <WH8099> lash-Shim-'o-Ni, of the Simeonites שְׁפַטְיָ֖הוּ <WH8203> she-fat-Ya-hu Shephatiah בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מַעֲכָֽה׃ <WH4601> ma-'a-Chah. of Maachah ס sa-Mek

לְלֵוִ֛י <WH3881> le-le-Vi Of the Levites חֲשַׁבְיָ֥ה <WH2811> cha-shav-Yah Hashabiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son קְמוּאֵ֖ל <WH7055> ke-mu-'El of Kemuel לְאַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> le-'a-ha-Ron of the Aaronites צָדֽוֹק׃ <WH6659> tza-Dok. Zadok ס sa-Mek

לִֽיהוּדָ֕ה <WH3063> li-hu-Dah Of Judah אֱלִיה֖וּ <WH453> 'e-li-Hu Elihu מֵאֲחֵ֣י <WH251> me-'a-Chei [one] of the brethren דָוִ֑יד <WH1732> da-Vid; of David לְיִ֨שָׂשכָ֔ר <WH3485> le-Yi-so-sh-Char, of Issachar עָמְרִ֖י <WH6018> 'a-me-Ri Omri בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מִיכָאֵֽל׃ <WH4317> mi-cha-'El. of Michael ס sa-Mek

לִזְבוּלֻ֕ן <WH2074> liz-vu-Lun Of Zebulun יִֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֖הוּ <WH3460> yish-ma'-Ya-hu Ishmaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עֹבַדְיָ֑הוּ <WH5662> 'oad-Ya-hu; of Obadiah לְנַ֨פְתָּלִ֔י <WH5321> le-Naf-ta-Li, of Naphtali יְרִימ֖וֹת <WH3406> ye-ri-Mot Jerimoth בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַזְרִיאֵֽל׃ <WH5837> 'az-ri-'El. of Azriel ס sa-Mek

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei Of the children אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim הוֹשֵׁ֖עַ <WH1954> ho-She-a' Hoshea בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עֲזַזְיָ֑הוּ <WH5812> 'a-zaz-Ya-hu; of Azaziah לַחֲצִי֙ <WH2677> la-cha-Tzi of the half שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> She-vet tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh יוֹאֵ֖ל <WH3100> yo-'El Joel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son פְּדָיָֽהוּ׃ <WH6305> pe-da-Ya-hu. of Pedaiah ס sa-Mek
